backend/main.mo: Canister backend defining storage, access control, approval flow, user profiles, and file/folder metadata with related query and update APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, access checks, profile gating, query cleanup, layout, and canister ID initialization.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Pending-approval screen showing the user's principal with copy support and instructions to contact an admin.
Empty placeholder file for admin management component.
frontend/src/components/FileGallery.tsx: Gallery‑style file and folder display with selection, previews, category icons, and action menus for downloads, moves, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Main file browser component handling folder navigation, sorting, uploads, previews, and multi-select operations.
frontend/src/components/FileListHeaderRo: Table header row for the file list with sortable columns and optional select-all checkbox.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal for previewing images, videos, audio, documents, and text files with navigation and fullscreen support.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying app version, copyright, and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, theme toggle, user info display, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin panel for managing members, roles, and viewing storage statistics.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component that handles username input with debounced uniqueness checks and saves the user profile.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanViewer.ts: Wrapper that provides zooming and panning interactions for its children with mouse and wheel events.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Bootstrap hook that initializes access control once per session and refreshes related React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state via AuthClient.
Session-only state hook that stores and updates view mode per folder.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user access, profile, file operations, and backend mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base layers and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Resolves backend and frontend canister IDs from multiple environment sources and provides helper accessors.
frontend/src/lib/dragDropDirectory.ts: Extracts dropped files and directories using the FileSystem API and builds relative paths, with fallbacks and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Generates fully qualified direct download URLs for files and copies them to the clipboard with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Provides utilities for file extensions, MIME type lookup, type classification, and generating human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/folderNavigation.ts: Builds folder paths, resolves folder IDs from path segments, and determines containing paths for files and folders.
frontend/src/lib/folderUpload.ts: Extracts folder structures from FileList inputs and uploads folders and files recursively with progress and empty-file handling.
frontend/src/lib/formatTime.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable dates and compact time strings.
frontend/src/lib/id.ts: Generates secure 32‑byte random hex IDs for uploads.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Normalizes strings for Unicode-aware, case-insensitive search and checks substring containment.
frontend/src/lib/sortFileSystemItems.ts: Provides deterministic sorting for file and folder items with support for multiple fields and stable tie-breakers.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Builds a parent‑child index of folders and returns all descendant folder IDs from a given start folder.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, feature requests, and metadata for the Drive Browser build.
